div.ab:
If it is for
silver
, do not pestle your
tartar
with
iron
but with the
handle of a hammer
, for if you touch & dip
iron
in your
whitening
, the
silver
would become red like
copper
& you would need to reheat it & put it again in
whitening
. Mix nothing with your
tartar
that should not enter the
whitening
, for this corrupts it. Do not let it spill out of its first boil, for in this is all its strength. The
whitening
is made with one
part
pulverized tartar
& a
half
of
common salt
.
